2. 5: This is a numerical value that represents the latitude of the location.
3. 14: This is a numerical value that represents the longitude of the location.
4. .263: This is a decimal value that represents the altitude of the location.
5. 11: This is a numerical value that represents the time zone of the location.
6. 1/2: This is a fractional value that represents the fraction of the location's time zone that is west of Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
